subject: RE: 7zip usage in ticketing system
body:
Dear Lily,

 

Thank you for your message. 

 

7-Zip is not a system-required tool, and removing it will not affect the normal operation of the system. 

 

You may uninstall it according to your needs.

 

If you any further queries, please do not hesitate to contact me.

 

Best Regards,

Carson Cheung

 

iSignage Limited



Direct : 2508 3433 I Fax : 2521 6118 I Website : www.isignage.com.hk <http://www.isignage.com.hk/> 

 

From: Lily Cheung <Lily_Cheung@smartone.com> 
Sent: Friday, February 13, 2026 10:26 AM
To: iSupport <support@isignage.com.hk>
Subject: 7zip usage in ticketing system

 

	CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organisation. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe.

Dear support,

 

We would like to confirm is 7zip program is in use in our ticketing system? Any zip process using script for upload data to our server? As we need to uninstall the program, thanks.

 

Best regards,

Lily Cheung

body:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organisation. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe. 
警告： 這封電子郵件來自外來電郵。如不認識寄件者，或不確定內容是否安全，切勿點開其中的連結，或是打開或儲存附件。 
Hi IQ support,

Pls help to check this case. Thanks
Location: Airside 11/F

Regards,
Fat

________________________________

寄件者: Winnie Ngan <winnie.ngan@prudential.com.hk>
寄件日期: 星期三, 2月 11, 2026 3:15 下午
收件者: Agency IT HKG <agency.it@prudential.com.hk>; Pauline PY Tse <pauline.py.tse@prudential.com.hk>; Ming Fat Wong <ming.fat.wong@prudential.com.hk>
副本: Jessica MS Lai <jessica.ms.lai@prudential.com.hk>; Daphne Fung <daphne.fung@prudential.com.hk>; AO Office HKG <ao.office@prudential.com.hk>
主旨: No room name display after QR code check-in at Airside MDRT Club 
 

Dear IT Team,

I would like to report that room name could not be shown automatically after QR code check-in at Airside MDRT Club.

Please help to check and advise. Thank you so much.

IPad




Laptop



Warm Regards,

Winnie Ngan
Workplace Experience Manager | Property Department  
Prudential Hong Kong Limited 
11/F AIRSIDE, 2 Concorde Road, Kai Tak, Kowloon
T: +852 2977 3858 
E: winnie.ngan@prudential.com.hk <mailto:winnie.ngan@prudential.com.hk> 
W: https://www.prudential.com.hk/

subject: Re: [CITIC HK #734912] [TST] [2/F] [Queue System issues for TST Branch - CNCBI]
body:
Dear Loper, 

Thank you for your feedback.  

After review, it is possible that the delay in powering on the TV compared to the player may have contributed to the issue. Our engineers have scheduled the player to restart at 8:55 in an attempt to address this.  

Please continue to monitor the situation and kindly inform us if the problem persists.  

If you any further queries, please do not hesitate to contact me. 

Best Regards, 
Carson Cheung 

iSignage Limited 

Direct : 2508 3433  I  Fax : 2521 6118  I  Website : www.isignage.com.hk <http://www.isignage.com.hk>

subject: iiSignage
body:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organisation. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe. 
警告： 這封電子郵件來自外來電郵。如不認識寄件者，或不確定內容是否安全，切勿點開其中的連結，或是打開或儲存附件。 

Dear iSignage Support,

 

I am trying to pair my iiyama ProLite LH5042UHS-B1 display with iSignage, but the App shows “NO Device detected.”

 

*	The display is connected via Ethernet, but I cannot access the network settings.
*	I have entered the server, device, and PIN as instructed in the manual, but it is not working.
*	The web portal is not reachable from my network.

 

Could you please provide a new pairing PIN for my device, or instructions on how to connect the display to the server?

 

Device details:

*	Model: iiyama ProLite LH5042UHS-B1

 

Thank you very much for your assistance.

Have a nice day!

 

Met vriendelijke groet,

 

Michelle Betten

Locatiemanager

 

 <https://www.frameoffices.com/nl> 


 <https://nl.linkedin.com/company/frame-offices>  <https://www.instagram.com/frameoffices/> 

 

T. +31 (0) 88 030 4058 | E. markt058@frameoffices.com <mailto:markt058@frameoffices.com>  | www.frameoffices.com <http://www.frameoffices.com/>  | Lange Marktstraat 1 | 8911 AD | Leeuwarden 

W. Maandag t/m vrijdag 

Dit bericht kan informatie bevatten die niet voor u is bestemd. Indien u niet de geadresseerde bent of dit bericht abusievelijk aan u is toegezonden, wordt u verzocht dat 

aan de afzender te melden en het bericht te verwijderen. Frame Offices B.V. aanvaardt geen aansprakelijkheid voor schade, van welke aard ook, die verband houdt met 

risico's verbonden aan het elektronisch verzenden van berichten.

sender: John Wan Lok Laam 溫諾嵐
subject: [Friendly reminder] 遠端伺服器存取系統更新 – CyberArk 培訓邀請
body:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organisation. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe. 
警告： 這封電子郵件來自外來電郵。如不認識寄件者，或不確定內容是否安全，切勿點開其中的連結，或是打開或儲存附件。 

致 各合作夥伴/供應商：

 

為提升系統安全性，本公司（大家樂集團）將升級遠端存取方案。日後將全面使用 CyberArk 系統取代現有的 Forti VPN，以供貴公司進行遠端伺服器連線與維護工作。

為確保過渡順利，避免影響日後的連線權限，我們將舉辦一場線上培訓，詳細講解 CyberArk 的操作流程。請貴公司務必安排相關技術人員出席。

 

培訓詳情如下：

*	日期： 1月27日 (星期二)
*	時間： 下午 16:00 – 17:00
*	形式： Microsoft Teams 線上會議
*	Microsoft Teams meeting 

Join: https://teams.microsoft.com/meet/47321486105171?p=0MlModhE3hGTw8JRLJ 

Meeting ID: 473 214 861 051 71 

Passcode: 9yn6EK7f 

 

如對本次更新有任何疑問，歡迎隨時與我們聯繫。感謝 貴公司的配合。


若貴公司人員未能出席, 請回覆通知我們。


大家樂集團 資訊科技部 (ITD) 謹啟

body:
Dear Daniel,

 

Our technicians have resolved this issue. The following is the report:

 

Found panel 4 using wrong URL. Corrected the URL and the setting then resume. 

User report that the sound lag, after reboot the player resumed. 

User tested and confirm ok.

 

If you any further queries, please do not hesitate to contact me.

 

Best Regards,

Carson Cheung

 

iSignage Limited

subject: City Workbench registration invitation
body:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organisation. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe. 
警告： 這封電子郵件來自外來電郵。如不認識寄件者，或不確定內容是否安全，切勿點開其中的連結，或是打開或儲存附件。 
Hi there,

You have been nominated by City FM as a Subcontractor Administrator to manage jobs for your organisation in City Workbench.

To access the site, all users must create a user profile.

Create your profile here <https://app.cityonsite.com/login?token=db4df7dc-0795-4f57-94c7-88d4712385ed> 

Once you have created your own profile, you can invite your field services team to create their own user profiles by inviting them through the user management page or allocating them a job.

If you have any questions about creating a profile or inviting additional users, there is a Quick Reference Guide available in the City Workbench portal.

If you still have issues, phone the City Closedown team on 1300 483 913.

Thank you and welcome to City Workbench.

The Team at City

subject: Incident BZ2601130068 - worknotes added
body:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organisation. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe. 
警告： 這封電子郵件來自外來電郵。如不認識寄件者，或不確定內容是否安全，切勿點開其中的連結，或是打開或儲存附件。 

A new work note has been added


Assignment Group: HKMX-Vendor PPN

Number: BZ2601130068

User: Ms Lam

Phone: 3709 8170

Status: New

Priority: 3-Normal

Created at: 2026-01-13 16:42:16

Location: 02313-美心Food2(德福)

Category: Hardware_operation

subject: Incident BZ2601130068 - worknotes added
body:

---------------------------------


2026-01-12 17:16:33 Helpdesk

PPN:

Onsite support

Edit all IP, now the IP are same as the yellow label. Tried to set remote tools but the software is blocked by MX antivirus. Set NTP service on the server. Check all network and found network of player3 (192.168.16.3) is not stable. Rewire the lan cable and do a swap test, confirmed the lan port of player 3 is not stable. Loan NUC for player 3  set ip, on time 6:03 and host. Also, found that the server has harddisk issue, suggested user to purchase new server. Since player 3 and server are out of warranty, told user will send a quote  for server and player3 later. User confirmed ok

Short Description: 電子餐牌2號早上6:15不會自動開機，user懷疑 HDMI線松


Work notes：


---------------------------------


2026-01-12 12:40:58 Suki.SL.Liang

vendor e-mail  content:

10/1/2026 Remote support

User report this morning

P2 black screen need replug hdmi to resumed display

P1 boot at 600 but user said tv 6.15 open

P1 in sleep mode

Set reboot at 6.15 solve sleep mode issue

Told user look tmr will it happen again

User confirm ok

2026年10月1日 远程支持

用户今早报告：

P2 黑屏，需要重新插拔 HDMI 线才能恢复显示

P1 启动时显示 600，但用户说电视开机时显示 6.15

P1 处于睡眠模式

将重启时间设置为 6.15 解决了睡眠模式问题

告知用户明天再看是否还会出现此问题

用户确认无误
